Reference

All functions

L_stats()

Compute L statistic for a point pattern

bulk_sample()

Create pseudo-bulk for each sample in a Seurat object

bulk_sample_celltype()

Create pseudo-bulk for each cell type of each sample in a Seurat object

check_data()

Check if required metadata is in the Seurat object

generateBPParam()

Enable parallel processing

get_num_cell_per_celltype()

Compute number of cells in each cell type in each spot for spatial transcriptomics data

get_num_cell_per_spot()

Estimate a relative number of cells per spot for spatial transcriptomics data

individual_geneset_proportion_celltype()

helper function to calculate proportion that a gene is expressed in each cell type in a sample

makeSeurat()

Format SingleCellExperiment or SpatialExperiment object into Seurat object for scFeatures functions

process_data()

data pre-processing

rearrange_string()

Rearrange string

remove_mito()

remove mito and ribo genes and genes highly correlated with mito genes as mitochondria and ribosomal genes may not as interesting to look at

run_L_function()

Generate L stats

run_Morans_I()

generate Moran's I

run_association_study_report()

Create an association study report in HTML format

run_celltype_interaction()

generate cell type interaction

run_gene_cor()

Generate overall aggregated gene correlation

run_gene_cor_celltype()

Generate cell type specific gene expression correlation

run_gene_mean()

Generate overall aggregated mean expression

run_gene_mean_celltype()

Generate cell type specific gene mean expression

run_gene_prop()

Generate overall aggregated gene proportion expression

run_gene_prop_celltype()

Generate cell type specific gene proportion expression

run_nn_correlation()

generate nearest neighbour correlation

run_pathway_gsva()

Generate pathway score using gene set enrichement analysis

run_pathway_mean()

Generate pathway score using expression level

run_pathway_prop()

Generate pathway score using proportion of expression

run_proportion_logit()

Generate cell type proportions, with logit transformation

run_proportion_ratio()

Generate cell type proportion ratio

run_proportion_raw()

Generate cell type proportion raw

scFeatures()

wrapper function to run all feature types in scFeatures
